name: Feedly wide with sidebar
description: A simple theme for Feedly for widescreen. Sidebar included (unlike other wide themes here)! Based on http://userstyles.org/styles/84468/feedly-wide-and-clean-like-google-reader with elements from http://userstyles.org/styles/84445/clean-feedly-for-wide-screen Differences: sidebar is enabled, Lucida font used for article view, some little visual tweaks Tested od 1680x1050, Chrome 28, Win 8; can be used with any color theme. Not to be used with other userstyles for Feedly. It has some bugs which you are free to correct. I merely put the theme to fit my needs.
